effects: Increase ATK by 30% for 3 turns when HP drops below 30% (max 9000x)
Increase MAG by 30% for 3 turns when HP drops below 30% (max 9000x)
name: Knight's Wrath
Knight's Wrath
騎士之怒
기사의 분노
Colère du chevalier
Ritterzorn
Cólera del caballero
desc_short: Boost ATK and MAG when HP drops below a certain level
HP低於一定量時提高攻擊與魔力的數值
HP가 일정량 이하일 때 공격력과 마력 상승
Augmente l'ATT et la MAGIE lorsque les PV ont atteint un certain niveau
Erhöht ANG und MAG, wenn die LP auf eine bestimmte Stufe fallen
Aumenta ATQ/MAG al bajar su VIT hasta cierto punto
